######### Protestant --> Tengri
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea_group = ancli0
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = ancli1
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		}

		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Hindu
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea_group = ancli0
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = ancli1
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = ancli2
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = ancli3
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic

		NOT = { has_idea = ancli5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = ancli5
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = ancli6
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = ancli7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = hindu0

		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = ancli0
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = ancli1
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = ancli2
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {

			}
		has_idea = ancli3
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = ancli4
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = ancli5
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = ancli6
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		add_idea = budda6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism

			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = ancli7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0

		religion  = coptic
		has_idea = ancli6
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		add_idea = coptic6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = coptic
		has_idea = ancli7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = coptic0

		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		add_idea = coptic6
		add_idea = coptic7
		}

		religion = animism
		has_idea = ancli6
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = ancli7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6
		add_idea = animist7
		}

######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = ancli0
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = feti0
		}

		add_idea = ibadi1
		add_idea = ibadi2
		add_idea = ibadi3
		add_idea = ibadi4
		}

		limit = {
		religion = ibadi
		has_idea = ancli5
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = ibadi0
		add_idea = ibadi1
		add_idea = ibadi2
		add_idea = ibadi3
		add_idea = ibadi4
		add_idea = ibadi5
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> Katholisch

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = nahu0
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		}

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = nahu4
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		}

######### Protestant --> Hindu
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea_group = nahu0
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = nahu1
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}

		add_idea = hindu5
		}

		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3

		add_idea = hindu5

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = nahu0
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = nahu1
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism

			religion = mahayana

		}

		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = nahu4
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = nahu5
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = nahu7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		add_idea = budda6
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {

		limit = {

			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = nahu0
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = feti0
		}

			religion = shamanism

		has_idea = nahu7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = ibadi0
		add_idea = ibadi1
		add_idea = ibadi2
		add_idea = ibadi3
		add_idea = ibadi4
		add_idea = ibadi5
		add_idea = ibadi6
		add_idea = ibadi7
		}

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = hussite
		has_idea_group = nahu0
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = hussite0
		}

		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> Katholisch
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = mesoam0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoam1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic

		NOT = { has_idea = mesoam2 }
		}

		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea = katholisch1
		}

		}

		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		add_idea = tengri5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = mesoam6
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoam7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		add_idea = tengri5
		add_idea = tengri6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = mesoam7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea_group = tengri0

		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		add_idea = tengri5
		add_idea = tengri6
		add_idea = tengri7
		}

		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Hindu
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea_group = mesoam0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoam1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = mesoam1
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoam2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}

		add_idea = hindu4
		}

		add_idea = hindu6
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = mesoam0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoam1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}

		NOT = { has_idea = mesoam2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}

		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5

		}

######### Protestant --> Romuva
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea_group = mesoam0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoam1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = romuva0

		add_idea = animist5

			religion = shamanism

		}

		}

		NOT = { has_idea = meso6 }
		}

		add_idea = ibadi1
		add_idea = ibadi2
		add_idea = ibadi3

		add_idea = ibadi5
		}

		add_idea_group = tengri0

		add_idea = tengri4
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = inti1
		NOT = { has_idea = inti2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = inti0
		add_idea_group = feti0
		add_idea = feti1
		}

		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = tote7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = tote0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		add_idea = tengri5
		add_idea = tengri6
		add_idea = tengri7
		}

######### Protestant --> Hindu

		if = {

		has_idea_group = tote0
		NOT = { has_idea = tote1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tote0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = tote0
		NOT = { has_idea = tote1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tote0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}

		NOT = { has_idea = tote2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tote0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}

			religion = buddhism

		add_idea = budda3
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = tote5 }
		}

		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		}

		limit = {

		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		add_idea = budda6

		add_idea = feti3
		}

			religion = shamanism

		add_idea = hussite2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {

		add_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea = hussite1
		add_idea = hussite2
		add_idea = hussite3
		}

		}

##################################################

		if = {

		}

		limit = {

		NOT = { has_idea = shia2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = shia2
		NOT = { has_idea = shia3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		}

		}

		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = shia0
		NOT = { has_idea = shia1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = shia1
		NOT = { has_idea = shia2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}

		OR = {
			religion = buddhism

			religion = mahayana

		}

		}

		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism

			religion = mahayana

		NOT = { has_idea = shia6 }

		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3

		}

		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		add_idea = budda6
		}

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea_group = shia0
		NOT = { has_idea = shia1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = shia1
		NOT = { has_idea = shia2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		}

		}

		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1

		add_idea = norse4
		}

		add_idea = norse6
		}

		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = shia6
		NOT = { has_idea = shia7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea_group = feti0
		add_idea = feti1
		add_idea = feti2
		add_idea = feti3
		add_idea = feti4
		add_idea = feti5
		add_idea = feti6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = shia7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea_group = feti0
		add_idea = feti1
		add_idea = feti2
		add_idea = feti3
		add_idea = feti4
		add_idea = feti5
		add_idea = feti6
		add_idea = feti7
		}

##################################################
######### ibadi ---> Katholisch

		if = {

		}

		}

		add_idea = katholisch4
		}

		remove_idea_group = ibadi0
		add_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea = confuci1
		add_idea = confuci2
		add_idea = confuci3
		add_idea = confuci4
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = ibadi6 }

		remove_idea_group = ibadi0
		add_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea = suomi1
		add_idea = suomi2
		add_idea = suomi3
		add_idea = suomi4
		add_idea = suomi5
		add_idea = suomi6
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {	
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
			religion = suomenusko
			}

		}

		add_idea = protestant1
		add_idea = protestant2
		add_idea = protestant3
		add_idea = protestant4
		add_idea = protestant5
		add_idea = protestant6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = hussite7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		add_idea = protestant2
		add_idea = protestant3
		add_idea = protestant4
		add_idea = protestant5
		add_idea = protestant6

##################################################
######### hussite --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = hussite0
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hussite1
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hussite2
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hussite3
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hussite4
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		}

		add_idea = jew1
		add_idea = jew2
		add_idea = jew3
		add_idea = jew4
		add_idea = jew5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = hussite6
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea = jew1
		add_idea = jew2

		NOT = { has_idea = hussite7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea = nahu1
		add_idea = nahu2
		add_idea = nahu3
		add_idea = nahu4
		add_idea = nahu5
		add_idea = nahu6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea = hussite7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea = nahu1
		add_idea = nahu2
		add_idea = nahu3
		add_idea = nahu4
		add_idea = nahu5
		add_idea = nahu6
		add_idea = nahu7
		}


		
##################################################
######### hussite --> Mesoamerican
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea_group = hussite0
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = mesoam0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion

		}

		add_idea = mesoam1
		}
